description:
Mount Fuji (called Fuji-san in Japan) is the largest mountain in Japan. Often seen with snow on the peak in colder months of the year.

It is considered lucky in Japan to dream of Mt Fuji in the first dream of the new year.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, Mount Fuji is depicted as a majestic, snow-capped peak rising serenely against a clear blue sky, rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and smooth gradients. The iconic conical shape is given a subtle 3D depth with soft rounded edges, making it a beautiful and instantly recognizable symbol. This emoji on Apple devices evokes a sense of awe, natural beauty, and iconic Japanese culture, often used to represent travel, nature, or Japan itself.
